verses.verse: לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תִזְבַּח֩ <S%H2076><s%> tiz-Bach Thou shalt not sacrifice לַיהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God שׁ֣וֹר <S%H7794><s%> Shor [any] bullock וָשֶׂ֗ה <S%H7716><s%> va-Seh, or sheep אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh has בוֹ֙ vo מ֔וּם <S%H3971><s%> Mum, wherein is blemish כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> kol any דָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> da-Var act רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> Ra'; adversity כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> ki is a תוֹעֲבַ֛ת <S%H8441><s%> to-'a-Vat for that [is] an abomination יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. he ס sa-Mek

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- If יִמָּצֵ֤א <S%H4672><s%> yim-ma-Tze If there be found בְקִרְבְּךָ֙ <S%H7130><s%> ve-kir-be-Cha among בְּאַחַ֣ד <S%H259><s%> be-'a-Chad you within any שְׁעָרֶ֔יךָ <S%H8179><s%> she-'a-Rei-cha, of thy gates אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God נֹתֵ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> no-Ten giveth לָ֑ךְ Lach; אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish thee man אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> 'ov- or אִשָּׁ֗ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah, or woman אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who יַעֲשֶׂ֧ה <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Seh that hath wrought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָרַ֛ע <S%H7451><s%> ha-Ra' wickedness בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָֽה־ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh- of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God לַעֲבֹ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> la-'a-Vor in transgressing בְּרִיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1285><s%> be-ri-To. his covenant

וַיֵּ֗לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech, gone וַֽיַּעֲבֹד֙ <S%H5647><s%> vai-ya-'a-Vod and served אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <S%H312><s%> 'a-che-Rim, other וַיִּשְׁתַּ֖חוּ <S%H7812><s%> vai-yish-Ta-chu and worshipped לָהֶ֑ם la-Hem; וְלַשֶּׁ֣מֶשׁ׀ <S%H8121><s%> ve-lash-She-mesh them either the sun א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or לַיָּרֵ֗חַ <S%H3394><s%> lai-ya-Re-ach, or moon א֛וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol any צְבָ֥א <S%H6635><s%> tze-Va or any of the host הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim of heaven אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- have not צִוִּֽיתִי׃ <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vi-ti. which I have not commanded

וְהֻֽגַּד־ <S%H5046><s%> ve-hug-gad- And it be told לְךָ֖ le-Cha וְשָׁמָ֑עְתָּ <S%H8085><s%> ve-sha-Ma-'e-ta; thee and thou hast heard וְדָרַשְׁתָּ֣ <S%H1875><s%> ve-da-rash-Ta [of it] and enquired הֵיטֵ֔ב <S%H3190><s%> hei-Tev, diligently וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh Behold אֱמֶת֙ <S%H571><s%> 'e-Met and behold [it be] true נָכ֣וֹן <S%H3559><s%> na-Chon certain הַדָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var, [and] the thing נֶעֶשְׂתָ֛ה <S%H6213><s%> ne-'es-Tah is wrought הַתּוֹעֵבָ֥ה <S%H8441><s%> hat-to-'e-Vah [that] such abomination הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot in בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> be-Yis-ra-'El. in Israel

וְהֽוֹצֵאתָ֣ <S%H3318><s%> ve-ho-tze-Ta Then shalt thou bring forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish that man הַה֡וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu he אוֹ֩ <S%H176><s%> o or אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאִשָּׁ֨ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah or that woman הַהִ֜וא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hiv he אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who עָ֠שׂוּ <S%H6213><s%> 'A-su which have committed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַדָּבָ֨ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var thing הָרָ֤ע <S%H7451><s%> ha-Ra' that wicked הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to שְׁעָרֶ֔יךָ <S%H8179><s%> she-'a-Rei-cha, unto thy gates אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאִ֕ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish [even] that man א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah; or that woman וּסְקַלְתָּ֥ם <S%H5619><s%> u-se-kal-Tam and shalt stone בָּאֲבָנִ֖ים <S%H68><s%> ba-'a-va-Nim them with stones וָמֵֽתוּ׃ <S%H4191><s%> va-Me-tu. till they die

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on פִּ֣י׀ <S%H6310><s%> pi At the mouth שְׁנַ֣יִם <S%H8147><s%> she-Na-yim of two עֵדִ֗ים <S%H5707><s%> 'e-Dim, witnesses א֛וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah or three עֵדִ֖ים <S%H5707><s%> 'e-Dim witnesses יוּמַ֣ת <S%H4191><s%> yu-Mat shall he that is worthy of death הַמֵּ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> ham-Met; be put to death לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יוּמַ֔ת <S%H4191><s%> yu-Mat, he shall not be put to death עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on פִּ֖י <S%H6310><s%> pi [but] at the mouth עֵ֥ד <S%H5707><s%> 'ed witness אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad. of one

יַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> yad The hands הָעֵדִ֞ים <S%H5707><s%> ha-'e-Dim of the witnesses תִּֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> tih-yeh- become בּ֤וֹ bo בָרִאשֹׁנָה֙ <S%H7223><s%> va-ri-sho-Nah shall be first לַהֲמִית֔וֹ <S%H4191><s%> la-ha-mi-To, upon him to put him to death וְיַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> ve-Yad the hands כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am of all the people בָּאַחֲרֹנָ֑ה <S%H314><s%> ba-'a-cha-ro-Nah; and afterward וּבִֽעַרְתָּ֥ <S%H1197><s%> u-vi-'ar-Ta away הָרָ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> ha-Ra' the evil מִקִּרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H7130><s%> mik-kir-Be-cha. from among פ Peh

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki If יִפָּלֵא֩ <S%H6381><s%> yip-pa-Le too hard מִמְּךָ֨ <S%H4480><s%> mi-me-Cha is too דָבָ֜ר <S%H1697><s%> da-Var If there arise a matter לַמִּשְׁפָּ֗ט <S%H4941><s%> lam-mish-Pat, for thee in judgment בֵּֽין־ <S%H996><s%> bein- between דָּ֨ם׀ <S%H1818><s%> dam between blood לְדָ֜ם <S%H1818><s%> le-Dam and blood בֵּֽין־ <S%H996><s%> bein- between דִּ֣ין <S%H1779><s%> din between plea לְדִ֗ין <S%H1779><s%> le-Din, and plea וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein and between נֶ֙גַע֙ <S%H5061><s%> ne-ga' and between stroke לָנֶ֔גַע <S%H5061><s%> la-Ne-ga', and stroke דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei [being] matters רִיבֹ֖ת <S%H7379><s%> ri-Vot of controversy בִּשְׁעָרֶ֑יךָ <S%H8179><s%> bish-'a-Rei-cha; within thy gates וְקַמְתָּ֣ <S%H6963><s%> ve-kam-Ta aloud וְעָלִ֔יתָ <S%H5927><s%> ve-'a-Li-ta, and get thee up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַמָּק֔וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-Kom, into the place אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יִבְחַ֛ר <S%H977><s%> yiv-Char shall choose יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh] which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha] thy God בּֽוֹ׃ bo.

וּבָאתָ֗ <S%H935><s%> u-va-Ta, And thou shalt come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הַכֹּהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-ha-Nim unto the priests הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim, the Levites וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and unto הַשֹּׁפֵ֔ט <S%H8199><s%> hash-sho-Fet, and unto the judge אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who יִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become בַּיָּמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> bai-ya-Mim that shall be in those days הָהֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> ha-Hem; those וְדָרַשְׁתָּ֙ <S%H1875><s%> ve-da-rash-Ta and enquire וְהִגִּ֣ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> ve-hig-Gi-du and they shall shew לְךָ֔ le-Cha, אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et דְּבַ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> de-Var thee the sentence הַמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> ham-mish-Pat. of judgment

וְעָשִׂ֗יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta, And thou shalt do עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- according פִּ֤י <S%H6310><s%> pi to the terms הַדָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var of the verdict אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יַגִּ֣ידֽוּ <S%H5046><s%> yag-Gi-du shall shew לְךָ֔ le-Cha, מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- that הַמָּק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-Kom which they of that place הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu, he אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יִבְחַ֣ר <S%H977><s%> yiv-Char shall choose יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; which the LORD וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H8104><s%> ve-sha-mar-Ta thee and thou shalt observe לַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot, to do כְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> ke-Chol to all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יוֹרֽוּךָ׃ <S%H3384><s%> yo-Ru-cha. according to all that they inform

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- According פִּ֨י <S%H6310><s%> pi According to the sentence הַתּוֹרָ֜ה <S%H8451><s%> hat-to-Rah of the law אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יוֹר֗וּךָ <S%H3384><s%> yo-Ru-cha, which they shall teach וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and according הַמִּשְׁפָּ֛ט <S%H4941><s%> ham-mish-Pat thee and according to the judgment אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which יֹאמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> yo-me-Ru which they shall tell לְךָ֖ le-Cha תַּעֲשֶׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh; thee thou shalt do לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not תָס֗וּר <S%H5493><s%> ta-Sur, thou shalt not decline מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַדָּבָ֛ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var from the sentence אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which יַגִּ֥ידֽוּ <S%H5046><s%> yag-Gi-du which they shall shew לְךָ֖ le-Cha יָמִ֥ין <S%H3225><s%> ya-Min thee [to] the right hand וּשְׂמֹֽאל׃ <S%H8040><s%> u-se-Mol. nor [to] the left

וְהָאִ֞ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-ha-'Ish And the man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Seh that will do בְזָד֗וֹן <S%H2087><s%> ve-za-Don, presumptuously לְבִלְתִּ֨י <S%H1115><s%> le-vil-Ti not שְׁמֹ֤עַ <S%H8085><s%> she-Mo-a' and will not hearken אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen unto the priest הָעֹמֵ֞ד <S%H5975><s%> ha-'o-Med that standeth לְשָׁ֤רֶת <S%H8334><s%> le-Sha-ret to minister שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> sham there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> o nor אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַשֹּׁפֵ֑ט <S%H8199><s%> hash-sho-Fet; or unto the judge וּמֵת֙ <S%H4191><s%> u-Met shall die הָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish even that man הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu, you וּבִֽעַרְתָּ֥ <S%H1197><s%> u-vi-'ar-Ta and thou shalt put away הָרָ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> ha-Ra' the evil מִיִּשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> mi-Yis-ra-'El. from Israel

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am And all the people יִשְׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> yish-me-'U shall hear וְיִרָ֑אוּ <S%H3372><s%> ve-yi-Ra-'u; and fear וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and will not יְזִיד֖וּן <S%H2102><s%> ye-zi-Dun and do no more presumptuously עֽוֹד׃ <S%H5750><s%> od. again ס sa-Mek
